channel.title: Compile problem
channel.description:
I've been searching on the whole forum for 2 days to see if I could find out what i have done wrong, but couldnt find any... well heres my problem when i try to compile:
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server Press any key to continue...
and this is what i have in the compile:
@echo off title CheezScape Compiler "C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_07injavac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:Program FilesJavajre1.5.0_07in/java.exe" server pause
can anyone tell me what i've done wrong? please Edit: If i get an answer that works, i'll give that person mod on my server![br][size=1]Posted at: July 21, 2006, 07:34:48 PM[/size][hr]please i really need some help

item.title: Compile problem
item.dc:creator: @xstrxpurez xstrxpurez
item.description:
@xstrxpurez wrote:

java= fine.
compiler= fine
enviomental variables= bad…

reset them.

Read full topic

item.title: Compile problem
item.dc:creator: @darkman210 darkman210
item.description:
@darkman210 wrote:

try this in your compiler. “@echo off title Compiler javac *.java pause” note: for each space in code press enter.

Read full topic

item.title: Compile problem
item.dc:creator: @meep meep
item.description:
@meep wrote:

His java is fine. He’s missing \s

@echo off title Yourservernamehere "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin/java.exe" server pause

That should work.

Read full topic

item.title: Compile problem
item.dc:creator: @lakelog lakelog
item.description:
@lakelog wrote:

I’ve been searching on the whole forum for 2 days to see if I could find out what i have done wrong, but couldnt find any…
well heres my problem when i try to compile:

Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server
Press any key to continue…

and this is what i have in the compile:

@echo off
title CheezScape Compiler
“C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_07injavac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:Program FilesJavajre1.5.0_07in/java.exe” server
pause

can anyone tell me what i’ve done wrong? please
Edit: If i get an answer that works, i’ll give that person mod on my server![br][size=1]Posted at: July 21, 2006, 07:34:48 PM[/size][hr]please i really need some help
